book.para: Binomial buffers are precomputed binomial (triangular) arrays of coefficients. One has to provide a function (AranBinomialBuffer@t@Generator) for processing every term in the buffer. Calling aran_binomial_buffer@t@_get () will do call the generator as many times as necessary and return the result. On the contrary, aran_binomial_buffer@t@_get_unsafe () assumes that the necessary calls to aran_binomial_buffer@t@_require () have been done previously.
